group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This research was approved by the Human Research Ethics Committee at the Federal University of São Carlos (process CAAE 92234518.6.0000.5504) and all procedures followed were performed in accordance with the ethical standards as laid down in the 1964 Declaration of Helsinki and its later amendments. Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
